Description.0: Multiple Choice Questionnaire: A Quiz in which students answer short multiple choice questions and write short answers to questions dealing with all aspects covered in the lectures.
Description.1: Assignment: Students produce a concept to provide essential information for the design of an environmental economic policy relying on environmental economic tools.
Description.2: Assignment: Students produce a policy-brief suggesting a solution to an environmental problem of their choice. The policy-brief highlights key concepts from the environmental economics literature.
